name: Speedo Tidal Cruiser Water Shoes - Children to Youths
description: With a breathable mesh upper and style that's a cut above your typical water shoe, theTidal Cruisers protect little feet and give them traction on slippery boat decks or docks.Breathable mesh upper drains well and dries quickly.Soft neoprene collar provides a secure fit and keeps debris out.Grippy, protective outsole.
